name: Lightning Ball: Return Home
description:
Lightning Ball: Return Home is fast, fun,  visually stunning and challenging game where you control an alien spherical ship that accidentally came to the Earth through a portal and must return home to its galaxy.

RICH LEVELS WITH VARIOUS THEMES, OBSTACLES AND GOALS

You will play different levels with themes such as production plant, nature with greenery, water, hills, fire, city and space in order to avoid obstacles, destroy enemies and collect enough points to upgrade and open the portal leading home

● Very dynamic, fun and sometimes challenging

● Visual stunning (foliage, hills, rivers, production plants, cities, space . . .)

● Many different obstacles to the goal challenging for all types of players

● Enemies

●  Many destructive elements, obstacles and secret passages

●  Upgrades that lead to the ultimate goal of the game

●  Graphic options for LOW, MEDIUM and HIGH mobile hardware specifications (in the case of any small lags)

●  if the game becomes difficult free UNLOCK NEW LEVEL button provides quick unlocking new level
